2.title: Guru
2.plot: After receiving a promising reply to their ad, the boys find themselves in a strange apartment sitting among a group of new age hippies. Despite their initial reservations, Jeff, Dickie and H stick it out as the organization's "followers" recount their experiences working with the group's leader. The boys eventual come face to face with the spiritual head of this gathering only to learn that things are not always as they appear.

3.title: In Session
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: When a golf foursome loses one of its members, the remaining hackers must take on the arduous task of finding his replacement. But with the season-ending club championship looming, the boys feel added pressure to fill out their group as soon as possible. Unfortunately, our three duffers will not be satisfied with merely adding a seasoned linksman; they are committed to raising their social profile with the addition of a handsome, gentleman golfer. And only a young and sinewy Jeff Goldblum type will do. Equipped with a healthy dose of misguided ambition, our boys dive head long into this endeavor and along the way encounter a motley crew of prospective candidates. With each failed "interview" Jeff, H and Dickie fall deeper and deeper into despair until their old buddy, Glen, returns to the fold just in time for the Fountainhead Invitational.
imdb.title: The Foursome
plot: When a golf foursome loses one of its members, the remaining hackers must take on the arduous task of finding his replacement. But with the season-ending club championship looming, the boys feel added pressure to fill out their group as soon as possible. Unfortunately, our three duffers will not be satisfied with merely adding a seasoned linksman; they are committed to raising their social profile with the addition of a handsome, gentleman golfer. And only a young and sinewy Jeff Goldblum type will do. Equipped with a healthy dose of misguided ambition, our boys dive head long into this endeavor and along the way encounter a motley crew of prospective candidates. With each failed "interview" Jeff, H and Dickie fall deeper and deeper into despair until their old buddy, Glen, returns to the fold just in time for the Fountainhead Invitational.::Pipaka Films, LLC
